overview: Ethnographic documentary showing the musical relationship of a group of women and men from Zobra, Serra do Candán, Pontevedra. Music is exposed as memory, experience and coexistence. Music for them becomes a bridge between two realities, the past and the present. This documentary loves us in relation to the music of a group of mulleres from the place of Zobra na serra do Candán, Galicia. To music as memory, experience and life. A comma music put between realities, or past and present.
title: Por que non cantades todas
